short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A complete replacement for the default HTML5 video and audio player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⭐ BetterPlayer was designed as a modern replacement for the default player built into Chrome.

⌨️ With BetterPlayer, you can use various keyboard shortcuts to quickly control the video playback.

🔥 Shortcuts 🔥
- ⏯️ Play / Pause: "Space"
- ▶️ Skip 10 Seconds: "Left / Right Arrow"
- ⏩ Skip 30 Seconds: "Shift" + "Left / Right arrow"
- ⏭️ Skip 60 Seconds: "Ctrl" + "Left / Right arrow"
- ⏪ Previous Frame: ","
- ⏩ Next Frame: "."
- 🔤 Captions: "C"
- 🔃 Reload: "R"
- 🖥️ Fullscreen: "F"
- 🔈 Decrease Volume: "Down Arrow"
- 🔊 Increase Volume: "Up Arrow"
- 🔇 Mute: "M"
- 🔙 Jump To Start: "Home"
- 🔚 Jump To End: "End"
- 🔝 Jump To Percentage: "0 - 9"
